title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running LLMs locally with a single CLI and Docker-style model pulls.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client library for chatting, embedding, pulling and managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting, model management, RAG and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, prompt templates and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI autocomplete powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Vercel template for building RAG apps using Ollama embeddings and Next.js.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama with async streaming support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfiles for running custom fine-tunes and quantized models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that test and package Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app for chatting with Ollama models in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that streams Ollama responses with session memory.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete, summarization and note Q&A via Ollama.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for JavaScript/TypeScript developers to integrate Ollama models.
